alert.note: Alert for Coastal Franklin; Coastal Gulf; Inland Franklin; Inland Gulf (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 10 at 3:29PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern Gulf and Franklin Counties through 400 PM EDT/300 PM CDT/... At 329 PM EDT/229 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 10 miles southeast of Carrabelle to near Apalachicola to 20 miles south of Port St. Joe. Movement was northwest at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Carrabelle, Eastpoint, Apalachicola, St George Island, Port St. Joe, Franklin, Carrabelle Beach, Royal Bluff, Eleven Mile, St George Island St Pk, Odena, Cape San Blas, Indian Pass, Beverly, Milltown, Bay City, Willis Landing, Apalachicola Airport, Simmons Bayou and Hays Place. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Franklin; Coastal Gulf; Inland Franklin; Inland Gulf
